short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hippo Scribe listens to your patient visit and automate documentations based on your conversation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hippo Scribe generates medical notes in seconds.

With Hippo Scribe, healthcare providers can focus 100% on their patients, knowing that Hippo Scribe will record the session and generate clinical notes in seconds. Our Chrome Extension works seamlessly with your EMRs.

Hundreds of clinicians are choosing Hippo Scribe for the following reasons:
	•	Privacy: We adhere to the highest standards and are fully HIPAA compliant.
	•	Custom templates: Our AI will learn your style and generate notes exactly how you’d write them.
	•	Speed: It takes seconds for Hippo Scribe to generate comprehensive documents from your hour-long sessions.

Learn more about Hippo Scribe at https://gethipposcribe.com.
